text.text_translated:
Asteroids are big rocks in space. NASA is now trying to find some of the smaller asteroids. They are looking for asteroids that are 140 metres wide or bigger. NASA thinks there are about 25,000 of these asteroids. They have found about 8,000. But they have not found 17,000 yet.

This is very important. In 2013, a small asteroid exploded over a city in Russia. It was only 19 metres wide, but it hurt 1,200 people. So, these bigger asteroids are very dangerous if they come near Earth.
